title: 4 reasons to learn a new language
description: English is fast becoming the world's universal language, and instant translation technology is improving every year. So why bother learning a foreign language? Linguist and Columbia professor John McWhorter shares four alluring benefits of learning an unfamiliar tongue.
author: John McWhorter
keywords: TED, talks, communication, education, online video, language, world cultures, personal growth, writing
